column5: To those of you going to B O Q this weekend   .  Don't forget your camera and to take lots of pics for those poor souls like me who have to stay here    .  If you're not going to B of Q, be safe and have fun too...still a bit of fishing to be done...  I you're stuck in the city, the Santa Clause Parade is on Sunday  Have a great day all...  Maureen
I wish I were going even with this rotten weather. Hope it doesn't mess up the fishin  Look forward to the pics and reports.  Good Luck
I'll second that Maureen! I hope everyone catches what they are after! Looking forward to the reports.  Whopper
Yeh...good luck to everyone and stay safe!!!  As this weekend got closer and closer, I wished I had the cash and time to head there with the others.....maybe next year.

thanks for your concern guys & gals ,we will be safe and hopefully come back with lots of pics and reports about all the walleyes that we caught and released,im really looking forward to this, take care & chat soon...........shawn
